response.explain: The previous action was to freeze the cheese tart. According to the observed objects, the cheese tart is already frozen and inside the fridge. The next step is to take the frozen cheese tart out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take out the frozen cheese tart from the fridge.
(4) Move the robot to the oven.
(5) Open the oven.
(6) Put the frozen cheese tart into the oven.
(7) Toggle on the oven to start cooking.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out the frozen cheese tart from the fridge
    cheese_tart = registry(env, "cheese_tart_188")
    EasyGrasp(robot, cheese_tart)
    donothing(env)
